text:
I am testing a web application that makes heavy use of the <base href> tag. It 
seems that this tag it is not evaluated when all pictures of a html page are 
requested that are referred to by relative links.
creator: bertil@csi.com
mramshaw@alumni.concordia.ca
text:
The documentation for 'HTTPSampleFull' specifically states that 
the HTML <BASE ...> tag is ignored. Still, I will have a look at this.

My apologies for not taking care of this. I put myself down for it, but then became busy. 
 
I'm sure that Jordi or Peter has fixed this by now. If so, can one of you close this bug? 
 
    TIA
creator: mramshaw@alumni.concordia.ca

text:
I'm sure the RegexpHTMLParser does. JTidyHTMLParser had this feature introduced
recently. So only HtmlParserHTMLParser is lacking this functionality (I believe).

I would consider this a bug, not an enhancement, but still a low-priority one --
since there's convenient workarounds.

We also need to remove that comment from the documentation.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
